title: bukowski book cover type
content:

thanks

comments.content:
It's Neil Bold again, I think.

[edit: [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020153012/http:/typophile.com/node/9314) is a thread where this was discussed before. There is a digital version, but locating a copy could be 'fun'.]
